questions.question: Who wrote the ancient surgical text Sushruta Samhita?
questions.answer: Sushruta

questions.question: Why could major surgery not develop earlier?
questions.answer: Lack of knowledge and technology

questions.question: Which substances made painless surgery possible?
questions.answer: Anaesthetics

questions.question: Which anaesthetics were used in the mid nineteenth century?
questions.answer: Ether and chloroform

questions.question: Who performed the first successful heart surgery?
questions.answer: Daniel Hale Williams

questions.question: Who was the patient saved by Dr Williams?
questions.answer: James Cornish

questions.question: What was injured near James Cornish’s heart?
questions.answer: An artery

questions.question: Which part of the heart was punctured?
questions.answer: Pericardium

questions.question: Who is called the father of modern neurosurgery?
questions.answer: Harvey Cushing

questions.question: What invention reduced blood loss in neurosurgery?
questions.answer: Cushing clip

questions.answer: Cushing clip

questions.question: Why was surgery painful in ancient times?
questions.answer: Because there were no anaesthetics to reduce pain.

questions.question: What is general anaesthesia?
questions.answer: It benumbs the whole body during surgery.

questions.question: What is local anaesthesia?
questions.answer: It numbs only the surgical area.

questions.question: Why was cardiac surgery unknown before 1893?
questions.answer: Doctors lacked modern tools and techniques.

questions.question: Who was Daniel Hale Williams?
questions.answer: He was the first successful cardiac surgeon.

questions.question: What is the pericardium?
questions.answer: It is the sack around the heart.

questions.question: What is neurosurgery?
questions.answer: It is surgery of the brain, spine, and nerves.

questions.question: How did Harvey Cushing reduce mortality?
questions.answer: By controlling blood loss during surgery.

questions.question: What is robotic surgery?
questions.answer: It is minimally invasive surgery using robotic systems.

questions.question: What is the Da Vinci system?
questions.answer: It is the world’s most advanced surgical robot.
